Class RESTResponseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.service.jaxrx.util.RESTResponseHelper

  • public final class RESTResponseHelper
extends Object
    This class is a helper class to build the response XML fragment for REST resources.
    Author:
    Patrick Lang, Lukas Lewandowski, University of Konstanz
